converse.line: Hey, Gabe...
I've told you many times to call me Lord Gaben. Please make that correction in the future.
Sorry, Gabe. But I can't do that. It's too weird, you know?
Whatever! What business do you have here?
I was just dropping by--
If you came here for nothing, then leave! I'm busy coding.
Fine. Have a wonderful day, Lord Gaben.
Hey, Gabe. I need a favor. (What have I gotten myself into?)
From me? Get someone else to do it. I've got a lot of tasks in my queue.
It's something only you can do. It's hacking into the school system to change a grade.
That's child's play. You can't even do that? What a scrub.
Look, Gabe. I really need you to do this for me. Will you do it?

Asking for a favor without a reward? I'm not one of your good friends, lass. ...But fear not. Lord Gaben shall take pity on your soul. If you can swap something of equal value, surely I, the mighty and all powerful Lord Gaben, shall provide.
I am in your debt, Lord and savior of all the land. Without You, who knows what the world would become?

choice.line: Give me something reasonable I can do in exchange.
Processing...
Your search returned 3 items. Good thing my task list is always sorted. I've got a program that I need a 3D model for, which requires a real life person to convert into data.
I find that weird how that's at the top of your list. Next item, please.
I've got approximately 8,694,323 papers that need converting into the superior storage medium, computers.
...What's the last item?

To pick up the latest MSI GeForce GTX 970 from the closest hardware store. My SocioEconomic Level Detector and Analyzer (SELDA) has returned a report stating that you are too poor to complete the last task.
The easiest one is the 3D model job, but you are free to do any other one in exchange for my 1337 hacking skills.
Sounds like a plan. (He's creepy, I tell ya. The last item seems like the most reasonable, but how can I get something so expensive?)
What exactly are you doing now?
I'm calculating the market to find out the perfect time I should bless my followers with a Steam Sale.
Sounds like an important job.
You don't even know how hard it is to be a computer genius. My processor, despite being overclocked, nearly overheats every day.
Who do you work for?

A variety of clients, some of which I can't disclose to you. A big client in the local area, called Lambda Drinks Corporation, pays me the big dollars for my cybersecurity protection. If you think I'm rich, they're at least x^2 as much rich.
Oh, you mean the people who live in the huge mansion in the north of town? I know them.
You should. They're the best known drink company on this entire planet! They basically have a monopoly in the industry. Put a whole lot of money into computer technology research too.
I see why you work for them.

converse.line: I've got your... TRI GuNiche 302, whatever, graphics card for you.
You mean the MSI GeForce GTX 970? Lame scrub. You can't be serious...
Whoa! Incredible! This was just released, having a high release price yet you still managed to retrieve it. I guess my SELDA needs adjusting...
Lord Gaben is impressed. He shall perform one reasonable deed of your choice.

choice.line: I'd never ask for anything in return for such a good friend of mine.
Don't be silly, moral. Lord Gaben has no friends. No one can handle his godly powers.
I told you from the beginning we would conduct a swap, not adding a favor to the queue.
I'd like you to hack into the school system and change a grade.
That's what you want still? I guess I can do that.

converse.line: I will commence the hacking now. Systems, power up! Let's break their puny firewall!
It is finished. He now has a B in history. Now, be gone! I've got important work to do.
Okay, okay.
Didn't I tell you I'm busy? Leave me!
Thanks for your help, Gabe.
Is that all you came here for? To say thanks? There's no need, as we both benefited from the trade.
It's just nice to say "thank you," okay? I'll be leaving now.
Emere, ...The Lord thanks you for being of assistance. He'd not be against trading in the future.
I'll keep that in mind.
